channel.title: Preparation on Complexity Methods for Behavioural Science
channel.description: Recent content in Preparation on Complexity Methods for Behavioural Science

item.title: Recommendation Station
item.description: The following sources are recommendations to consume as you see fit, before, or, after the course. It is very likely we will refer to some of these sources during the course. but it is not necessary to study them to follow the course! They can provide more background, more depth, breadth, more confusion, illuminaion, and probably many other thigs as well. Recommended Reading Books The End of Average by Todd Rose Dynamics of Complex Systems by Yaneer Bar-Yam A Dynamic Systems Approach to the Development of Cognition and Action by Esther Thelen & Linda Smith Dynamic Patterns: The Self-Organization of Brain and Behavior by Scott Kelso Scale by Geoffrey West Sync by Steven Strogatz
